title: Implement Multi-Step Form Architecture
description: Implement proper multi-step form architecture with entity grouping and design system compliance for booking creation

user_stories: As a user, I want guided form steps so that I can complete bookings easily
As a developer, I need reusable form step components so that I can build complex forms quickly
business_rules: Multi-step forms must group entities into separate cards with section headers
Each step must group different entities (no mixing entities within single step)
Form layout must use maximum two-column design
Larger text fields must merge two columns to create single column
Form must follow design system validation message placement
edge_cases: Handling form validation across multiple steps
Managing form state during step navigation
Processing partial form completion and auto-save
Handling step navigation with validation errors

acceptance_criteria: Multi-step form groups entities into separate cards with section headers
Each step groups different entities without mixing
Form uses maximum two-column design with merged columns for larger fields
Validation messages display directly under field elements
Form handles step navigation with proper validation

integration_tests: Multi-step form integration with booking workflow

additional_context.technical_notes: Implement multi-step form architecture following design system specifications. Create reusable form step components and proper state management. Ensure entity grouping and column layout compliance.
additional_context.security_considerations: Ensure proper input validation across all form steps
